text: Ndipo ngati Ife titachedwetsa chilango chawo mpaka pa tsiku lokhazikitsidwa, iwo adzafunsa kuti: “Nanga ndi chifukwa chiyani tsikulo lili kuchedwa?” Ndithudi pa tsiku limene izi zidzachitika, palibe chilichonse chimene chingadzapirikitse chilangocho ndipo zoopsa zimene iwo ali kuseka zidzawazungulira iwo onse
